title: ADC items to help out the newbies here
body: Hope this works for some of you that may need a bit on the new items on whose decent with them. Hope it isn't terrible.

replies.body:
Why the hell would you recommend Trinity on Kog? That's disgusting. It has no AP anymore, 5 less AD, half the attack speed, and his R does no damage unless the person is low so using it prior to the enemy being at 30% is a HUGE waste of mana.

Trinity is god awful right now on just about every champ. Even Corki is doing better with Rapidfire Cannon and Shiv since they do magic damage, provide more crit, and provide more AS. Trinity is a pretty garbo item now. It lost tons of stats for 10% crit. 

Twitch also needs a second crit item over a Ghostblade. He was able to make the 15% crit on Ghostblade work before, but now 20% isn't going to cut it. Better off with a Phantom Dancer or a Shiv.

A last whisper type isn't actually that necessary unless you are dealing with high armor/health stackers or a really oppressive tank. It only works on bonus armor, so it's not going to do that much damage to squishies, and it would be better to grab another Zeal item to hit 100% crit
Thank you so much for this. I was having trouble building my {{champion:18}} . but now imma give this build a shot.

I think you should just point out the major Core items. Its still very nice though! Now there is so many options, that anything could potentially work. And try to point out stats that each champions work best with. This is just my thoughts though.

Much better build options for Quinn
ER, SS, Greaves (take Alacrity enchant) , IE, BT (or Mercurial Scimitar), then finish with either a PD, LW item, or GA/Banshee's, all depending on what you need.

Tanks a big problem? Get a LW item (pick the one you need)
Being bursted too hard? Get GA
AP is the problem? Get Banshee's

If none of these work, then just go for PD. Final build gives you 100% crit, over 300 AD, and a ton of MS and AS
